content.rendered:
Please use the form on this page to send a message. You may also contact me by phone. Please know that contacting me does not establish a therapeutic relationship.

Phone: 727-800-3260

Location Information

My office is located near downtown St. Petersburg. If you are interested in working with me but not in the Tampa Bay area, I also provide therapy services online to Florida residents.
163 5th Ave NE, St. Petersburg, FL 33701

Send Me Your Questions

This contact form should not be used for urgent or emergent psychological issues. If you need immediate help please call 911, visit your local ER, or use the crisis text-line (Text HOME to 741741).


If you have a general inquiry, please use the form below.

Questions about fees or insurance? Answers can be found here.

I will attempt to return your message as soon as possible.

By submitting this form via this web portal, you acknowledge and accept the risks of communicating your health information via this unencrypted email and electronic messaging and wish to continue despite those risks. By clicking "Yes, I want to submit this form" you agree to hold Brighter Vision harmless for unauthorized use, disclosure, or access of your protected health information sent via this electronic means.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Individual Therapy
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Individual Therapy for Adults Our work together will be customized to meet your specific needs and goals. Whether you are struggling with anxiety, stress, relationship problems, or managing difficult life changes, I will help you recognize underlying problems, fully realize your strengths and adjust certain behaviors and thoughts to see…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Free Consultation Request
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Please complete the form below to schedule a complimentary consultation. This 20-minute phone call is for me to learn more about your concerns and for you to learn about my approach and to ask any questions you may have. At the end, we can decide if we'd like to move…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Fees
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Rates $230 Initial Intake 60 minutes $180 Individual Therapy Session 50 minutes Insurance I am not paneled with insurance companies and am considered an out-of-network provider. If your insurance company provides out-of-network reimbursement,  I can provide a detailed receipt each month. You can submit this to your insurance company if…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Home
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Welcome! Do you find yourself frequently worried or anxious? Are you going through a big change (i.e. a break-up, divorce, new job, loss) that is causing increased stress or uncomfortable emotions? Life can be so difficult at times. Even the strongest people need a little bit of help to work…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Client Forms
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: If you are new, please be sure to fill out the following forms, and bring them to your first session. This will help ease you in and allow as much time as possible to focus on you. Client Intake Form Information Sheet Limits of Confidentiality If you feel that you…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Mental Health Links
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: The following links are listed to provide you with additional online mental health care information. Please also check the additional links provided for physical health for a more comprehensive understanding of your overall well-being.
